content_data.name: Hair Extensions
content_data.description: Premium virgin human hair extensions including bundles, closures, and frontals. Ethically sourced from Brazil, Vietnam, Peru, Malaysia, India, and Cambodia.

content_data.name: Hair Bundles
content_data.description: 100% virgin human hair bundles in various textures and lengths. Cuticle-aligned for minimal tangling and maximum longevity.

content_data.name: Brazilian Hair
content_data.description: Brazilian hair is known for its versatility and durability. Soft, thick from root to tip, and holds curls beautifully. Perfect for all textures and styles.

content_data.name: Vietnamese Hair
content_data.description: Raw Vietnamese hair from single donors. Never chemically processed, known for incredible shine, silky texture, and longevity. Can last 3-5 years with proper care.

content_data.name: Peruvian Hair
content_data.description: Lightweight yet full-bodied with a natural luster. Blends seamlessly with most hair textures, perfect for natural everyday looks.

content_data.name: Malaysian Hair
content_data.description: Renowned for incredible softness and natural shine. Perfect for achieving sleek, silky looks and holds straightened styles beautifully.

content_data.name: Indian Hair
content_data.description: Natural wave pattern that blends well with relaxed and natural African American hair textures. One of the most popular and accessible virgin hair types.

content_data.name: Cambodian Hair
content_data.description: Naturally wavy, incredibly thick, and known for durability. Perfect for those who want volume and body.

content_data.name: Closures
content_data.description: Premium lace closures to complete your sew-in. Available in HD lace, transparent lace, and silk base. Sizes: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6. Pre-plucked with baby hairs.

content_data.name: Frontals
content_data.description: Ear-to-ear lace frontals for maximum styling versatility. Available in 13x4 and 13x6 with HD or transparent lace. Pre-plucked and bleached knots available.

content_data.name: Wigs
content_data.description: Human hair wigs for instant glam. Lace front, full lace, U-part, and headband wigs in various lengths, colors, and textures.

content_data.name: Lace Front Wigs
content_data.description: Natural-looking lace front wigs with pre-plucked hairlines. Perfect for beginners and everyday wear.

content_data.name: Full Lace Wigs
content_data.description: 360-degree styling freedom. Wear high ponytails, updos, and any style you desire.

content_data.name: Glueless Wigs
content_data.description: No glue, no tape, no problem! Adjustable straps and combs for secure, damage-free wear.

content_data.name: Colored Wigs
content_data.description: Pre-colored wigs in blonde, burgundy, ombre, and fashion colors. No bleaching required!

content_data.name: Shop by Texture
content_data.description: Find your perfect texture. From sleek straight to bouncy curls, we have every texture to match your style.

content_data.name: Straight
content_data.description: Sleek and sophisticated straight hair bundles. Perfect for a polished, professional look.

content_data.name: Body Wave
content_data.description: Our most popular texture! Loose, flowing waves that add volume and movement.

content_data.name: Deep Wave
content_data.description: Defined, deep waves for a glamorous, voluminous look. Holds curl pattern beautifully.

content_data.name: Loose Wave
content_data.description: Relaxed, beachy waves for an effortlessly chic look.

content_data.name: Water Wave
content_data.description: Crimped, wet-look waves that give a fresh-from-the-beach vibe.

content_data.name: Curly
content_data.description: Bouncy, defined curls in various patterns from loose curls to tight coils.

content_data.name: Kinky
content_data.description: Natural 4A-4C texture that blends seamlessly with African American hair.

content_data.name: Hair Care
content_data.description: Professional hair care products for natural and extension hair. Shampoos, conditioners, oils, and treatments.

content_data.name: Shampoo & Conditioner
content_data.description: Sulfate-free shampoos and moisturizing conditioners formulated for virgin hair and extensions.

content_data.name: Oils & Serums
content_data.description: Nourishing oils and serums for shine, moisture, and scalp health. Argan, rosemary, and more.

content_data.name: Styling Products
content_data.description: Edge control, gels, mousses, and styling creams for perfect hold and definition.

content_data.name: Treatments
content_data.description: Deep conditioning masks, protein treatments, and leave-in conditioners for repair and maintenance.

content_data.name: Tools & Accessories
content_data.description: Professional styling tools, wig caps, combs, brushes, and installation accessories.

content_data.name: Flat Irons
content_data.description: Professional ceramic and titanium flat irons for sleek, straight styles.

content_data.name: Curling Irons
content_data.description: Curling wands and irons in various barrel sizes for waves and curls.

content_data.name: Blow Dryers
content_data.description: Professional blow dryers with ionic technology for fast, damage-free drying.

content_data.name: Clippers & Trimmers
content_data.description: Professional clippers and trimmers for precision edging and cutting.

content_data.name: Wig Accessories
content_data.description: Wig caps, wig glue, lace tint, edge bands, and installation supplies.

content_data.name: Braiding Hair
content_data.description: Synthetic and human hair for braids, twists, locs, and crochet styles.

content_data.name: Kanekalon Braids
content_data.description: Classic Kanekalon braiding hair in every color. Lightweight and tangle-free.

content_data.name: Crochet Hair
content_data.description: Pre-looped crochet braids in various textures. Quick and easy installation.

content_data.name: Loc Extensions
content_data.description: Human hair and synthetic locs for instant length and fullness.
